name: FPS: Operation United Peace
description:
• While terror overshadows the world, you are chosen to fight against the deadly threat...

A big terror organisation needs to be taken out, and it is your mission to save the world. With special equipment you will enter their bases to take them out.

Because of a realistic health system you have to be careful while clearing rooms.

Prove your tactial skills in different missions!

Features:

  • Tactical Shooter
  • 10 Missions + 1 Tutorial
  • Different Locations
  • Tactical Gameplay like breaking through doors
  • Realistic Health Setting
  • Bonus Zombie Missions
